# unhide()

**Type Method**

Negates an earlier call to [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSCursor/hide()] by showing the current cursor.

## Declaration

```swift
class func unhide()
```

## Discussion

Each invocation of `unhide` must be balanced by an invocation of [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSCursor/hide()] in order for the cursor display to be correct.

## Setting cursor attributes

- **image**: The cursor’s image.
- **hotSpot**: The position of the click location within the cursor.
- **hide()**: Makes the current cursor invisible.
- **setHiddenUntilMouseMoves(_:)**: Sets whether the cursor is hidden until the mouse moves.
